project_path.CumBlast: contracts/CumBlast Full Smart Contract Security Audit/CumBlast

findings.title: Out of gas in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are too many excluded addresses.
